about_the_game:
Story

The main character, Keisuke, wakes up in his home and is going to college. But his normal day is cut short when he is hit by a truck and finds himself in an unfamiliar room. There he is met by a cute girl guide named Midori, who informs him that he has entered purgatory. To get into the isekai, Keisuke needs to win three rounds of Russian roulette, complicated by extra cards. For each game won, Midori rewards him in a special way.



However, in reality, there are secrets behind this world that Keisuke has to unravel. Will you be able to find out the truth and get out of this dangerous game?

Unique Elements

Unique plot: Immerse yourself in a world of mysticism and intrigue, where every victory you win brings you closer to unraveling the true motives.
Interactive gameplay: Try your luck at Russian Roulette with unique additional cards that affect the outcome of the battle.
Unexpected twists and turns: Find out what lies behind the beautiful faces of the guides and what secrets they are keeping.
Intimate Rewards: Special Midori treats await you for winning the game.
Colorful graphics: The detailed characters and visual style create an atmosphere you'll want to immerse yourself in again and again.

Test your nerves and luck in Lust Shot. Are you ready to uncover all the secrets and survive in this dangerous game?

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes scenes depicting sex, rape, murders, suicide talk, incest, blood.

name: Lust Shot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Immerse yourself in the exciting world of "Lust Shot" - a visual novel with action elements, where each victory brings you closer to solving dark secrets.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
